title: Protest erupts in Hikkaduwa against government
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); People in Hikkaduwa staged a protest Monday (4) morning demanding solutions to the crises that have plagued the nation.
People are demanding the Government to leave citing that the state has failed to take any responsiblity over the present situation.
Several foreign nationals who are on holiday in Sri Lanka also joined the protest.
Protests erupt across Sri Lanka; Protestors refuse to accept interim solution
(VIDEO) Protest close to Carlton House in Tangalle; large crowd scuffles with police
